announcement.message: We will be performing scheduled system maintenance on September 25 from 6PM - 8PM EST. During this time users will be unable to log in to the Filing application or create new accounts.
announcement.heading: Scheduled Maintenance
2025 Online Filing Instructions Guides Released
announcement.message: The Bureau has released the 2025 Online FIG and Online Supplemental Guide for Quarterly Filers for 2025, which are available

announcement.heading: 2023 Data Publication Release
announcement.message: On July 11, 2024, the 2023 national loan-level datasets, disclosure reports, and MSA/MD aggregate reports were released and can be accessed via the Data Publication page. Users can now explore 2023 HMDA data using the Data Browser's dataset filtering tool or maps.

announcement.heading: 2024 Q1 Graphs Released
announcement.message: HMDA Quarterly Graphs have been updated to include data from the 2024-Q1 filing period and can now be filtered by loan purpose. View Quarterly Graphs

announcement.heading: Signing in using Login.gov will be mandatory for the 2024 filing season
announcement.message: When logging into the HMDA Platform to file their 2024 annual data, users will need to login with Login.gov using MFA. Users will no longer have the option to sign in using the existing process.

filingAnnouncement.message: We will be performing scheduled system maintenance on September 25 from 6PM - 8PM EST. During this time users will be unable to log in to the Filing application or create new accounts.
filingAnnouncement.heading: Scheduled Maintenance
